ca.ualberta.ridr

Class RequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.ridr.RequestController

  • public class RequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller controls access to all requests used by a view This controllers uses threads to asynchronously perform network requests It then uses a callback interface to inform the view that is using the controller that data has been updated

      • createRequest

        public void createRequest(Rider rider,
                          java.lang.String pickup,
                          java.lang.String dropoff,
                          com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng pickupCoords,
                          com.google.android.gms.maps.model.LatLng dropOffCoords,
                          java.util.Date date,
                          float fare,
                          float costDistance)
        Creates a new request
        Parameters:
        rider - Rider object. currently logged in rider who is creating the request
        pickup - String of the pickup address
        dropoff - String of the dropoff address
        pickupCoords - Coordinates of pickup location
        dropOffCoords - Coordinates of dropoff location
        date - Date at which the rider wishes to be picked up
